hero.title: My philosophy
hero.subtitle: Hi, I’m Jane Pokkinen — personal trainer, health coach, and group fitness instructor with 13 years of coaching in three countries. I help busy people build strength, confidence, and everyday energy.

introCard.title: Free Intro Call
introCard.subtitle: 15 minutes · online
introCard.description: Not sure where to start? Book a quick chat. We’ll map your goals, constraints, and an easy first step.

testimonials.quote: Jane's coaching changed my life. I have more energy, I'm stronger, and I feel more confident than ever before.
testimonials.author: Sarah J.

testimonials.quote: The personalized plan and constant encouragement made all the difference. Highly recommend!
testimonials.author: Mark R.

testimonials.quote: As a beginner, I was nervous, but Jane made me feel comfortable and guided me every step of the way.
testimonials.author: Laura P.

about.title: Training that meets you where you are
about.subtitle: Lifestyle changes, health challenges, or getting your mojo back — I coach the whole person. I listen when you need a listener and give a friendly push when you need one.
bullets: Strength & functional training for real life
Sleep habit coaching to reduce reliance on pills over time
Confidence rebuild after injury with practical, NLP-informed tools

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Choose the support that fits your life and schedule.

items.title: 1:1 Personal Training
items.desc: Fully personalized coaching in-person or online. Technique, progression, accountability.

items.title: Small Group Training
items.desc: High-energy small groups and bootcamps with smart progressions and team spirit.

items.title: Confidence After Injury
items.desc: Bridge the gap after physio. Regain trust in your body with step-by-step progressions.

items.title: Nutrition Coaching
items.desc: Low-FODMAP & dairy-free friendly plans. Practical meal-prep strategies for busy weeks.

items.title: Menopause-Savvy Coaching
items.desc: Strength, recovery, and habit tweaks that respect hormonal shifts and energy levels.

items.title: Workshops & Corporate
items.desc: Motivating talks and movement sessions for teams and wellbeing days.

pricing.title: Simple Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Transparent options. No surprise fees.
pricing.note: Custom corporate & workshop pricing on request

qas.q: I’m a beginner — is this for me?
qas.a: Absolutely. We tailor everything to your current level and build up safely.
Yes. We can work fully online or hybrid with check-ins and video form reviews.
Yes. I create practical low-FODMAP, dairy-free friendly plans with simple swaps.

qas.q: What if I’m post-injury and nervous?
qas.a: We rebuild confidence step-by-step with clear progressions and ‘win’ moments each week.

contact.title: Let’s talk
contact.subtitle: Tell me your goals and I’ll map your next steps.
contact.name: Name
contact.message: What would you like help with?
contact.messagePlaceholder: I'd like to get in touch about...
contact.philosophyText: My approach is about building a sustainable foundation, not quick fixes. We work together to create habits that stick, so you can achieve lasting health and confidence.
contact.message-sent: I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
